function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to volatile organic compounds (VOCs) such as xylene, ethylbenzene, toluene, and benzene in the built environment","Impact":"Health risks including respiratory issues, headaches, dizziness, and other harmful effects","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of indoor air quality, use of better ventilation systems, and avoiding exposure to VOCs","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, distributed sensor networks, cloud-based WSN systems, and monitoring software","People":"Residents of urban and rural areas, especially those with traditional cooking systems and inadequate ventilation","Owner":"Researchers, environmental health organizations, and building management firms"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality (IAQ) leading to potential health risks for residents","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory issues, headaches, dizziness, and other harmful effects due to exposure to poor IAQ","Mitigation":"Implementation of reliable and efficient IAQ monitoring systems, instant alert systems for proper ventilation, and regular analysis of IAQ data","Technologies":"Monitoring systems, cloud-based WSN systems, instant alert systems, and analysis software","People":"Residents of urban and rural areas, especially those with traditional cooking systems and inadequate ventilation","Owner":"Researchers, environmental health organizations, and building management firms"},{"Description":"Weaknesses in existing IAQ monitoring systems leading to unreliable data and potential health risks for residents","Impact":"Lack of accurate information about IAQ can lead to inadequate mitigation measures and increased health risks","Mitigation":"Addressing the weaknesses through advanced sensor technologies, improved data processing algorithms, and regular assessment of system performance","Technologies":"Advanced sensor technologies, data processing algorithms, and performance assessment tools","People":"Researchers, environmental health organizations, and building management firms","Owner":"Researchers, environmental health organizations, and building management firms"}]}
